prompts: A realistic video of a modern city park environment. A young man in his late 20s, with messy black hair, wearing a vintage blue denim jacket, sits alone on a park bench. He holds a sketchbook in his hands, looking pensive and expectant. The background features blurred greenery and walking paths, but the area around the bench is empty except for him. Medium shot, static frame.

A realistic video of a modern city park environment. The main protagonist in the denim jacket remains seated on the bench. Another man, around 30 years old, wearing glasses and a casual grey sweater, walks into the frame and sits next to him holding a coffee cup. They begin to converse, and the protagonist gestures towards the sketchbook in his hand. The background remains peaceful with dappled sunlight. Medium shot, static frame.

A realistic video of a modern city park environment. The protagonist and the man in the grey sweater are talking on the bench. A young woman in her late 20s, with long hair and wearing a flowing white dress, approaches them carrying a shoulder bag. She stands near the bench, smiling and greeting both men. The man in the sweater looks up at her, creating a three-person interaction. Medium shot, static frame.

A realistic video of a modern city park environment. The man in the grey sweater stands up, waves goodbye to the other two, and walks out of the frame to the left. The scene now leaves only the protagonist in the denim jacket and the woman in the white dress. The woman sits down in the spot previously occupied by the man, turning her body towards the protagonist, ready for a deeper conversation. Medium shot, static frame.

A realistic video of a modern city park environment. The protagonist in the denim jacket solemnly pulls out a detailed charcoal portrait from his sketchbook to show the woman. The camera zooms in smoothly to focus exclusively on the drawing, filling the frame with the details of the portrait, showcasing delicate lines and expressions, while the characters in the background become blurred. Close-up shot, focus on the paper.

A realistic video of a modern city park environment. The camera zooms out, returning to the original composition. We see the protagonist in the denim jacket still holding the portrait, while the woman in the white dress stares at it with an expression of surprise and emotion. The two sit on the park bench, surrounded by the peaceful atmosphere. Medium shot, static frame.
